wiki.content:
A soothing acoustic interlude, it offers a benign slant on druggy oblivion ("My heart is broke/But I have some glue/Help me inhale/And mend it with you").
 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: A soothing acoustic interlude, it offers a benign slant on druggy oblivion ("My heart is broke/But I have some glue/Help me inhale/And mend it with you").

track.name: Dumb
comments: @Grimmoire  I hate you right now...
IMHO, this is their best song ever.
My heart is broke, but I have some glue, help me inhale, and mend it with you. We'll float around, and hang out on clouds, then we'll come down, and have a hangover.
Fab. band.
Ohhh! kurt is so cute in this video! Love this song so. I love you kurt, forever! : )
Probably my favorite song from the In Utero album.

My heart is broke
but I have some glue
help me inhale
and mend it with you
The cello on this is sublime.
v What?
The Beatles???
a little The Beatles??
possibly one of my favourite nirvana songs
Amazing talent!
Gorgeous vocals, love :-)
really brilliant song.
I believe more and more that being dumb is the key to happyness.  Ignorance truly is bliss.
lol grinmore....true
I think I'm just happy
When he sings "I think I'm dumb," you will now hear him saying "African dog." Cannot be unheard.
the most beautiful nirvana song. elegant, really  [2]
